Amy Hoover and I recently made available our accepted journal paper
sequel =
to the original conference paper on NEAT Drummer.  It's called
"Exploiting =
Functional Relationships in Musical Composition" and will
appear in the Con=
nection Science Special Issue on Music, Brain, &
Cognition in 2009:

Abstra=
ct: 
http://eplex.cs.ucf.edu/publication/2009/hoover.connectionscience09.ht=
ml

Direct link:
http://eplex.cs.ucf.edu/papers/hoover_connectionscience09.=
pdf

This paper explores more deeply the cognitive and neural implications
=
of the model, and the prospects for full-blown music generation.  If
you wa=
nt to skip the technical stuff, the introduction and discussion
are probabl=
y worth reading in their own right.  

We would certainly be interested in =
any thoughts it brings to mind.

ken
